abbot.tester

Class WindowTracker.WindowWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      • abbot.tester.WindowTracker.WindowWatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.WindowStateListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    WindowTracker

     class WindowTracker.WindowWatcher
extends java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
implements java.awt.event.ComponentListener
    Provides tracking of window visibility state. We explicitly add this on WINDOW_OPEN and remove it on WINDOW_CLOSE to avoid having to process extraneous ComponentEvents.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WindowTracker.WindowWatcher(java.awt.Window w)
      Do not call directly as can cause a stack overflow with multiple attacments to the listener list
